name: Swipes
overview:
Swipes is a simple, intuitive and lightning fast daily task planner. It is a mobile app that enables you to systemize your to-dos and immediately take an action on them – set them as a task for today, get them done now or schedule them for when they need to be tackled.

The app is based on the intuitive gestures of swiping a task among the three categories – “Scheduled”, “Today”, and “Done”. Have you heard about Mailbox, the most hyped mobile app at the moment? Well, now imagine it with much greater functions, all polished, rethought and put into the right context!

Learn more here: www.swipesapp.com
